meanings.definition: A polymer made from isoprene units.
meanings.sent1: The polyisoprene used in the experiment showed great flexibility.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers often use polyisoprene to create durable rubber products.
meanings.sent3: The polyisoprene polymer decided to stretch itself to impress the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: The chain of polyisoprene molecules linked together like a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The colorful polyisoprene strands danced under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: The polyisoprene tire provided excellent grip on the wet road.
meanings.sent2: Many medical gloves are made from polyisoprene due to its hypoallergenic properties.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous polyisoprene rubber ball bounced away from the playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: Her words bounced off him like a ball of polyisoprene.
meanings.sent5: The polyisoprene rubber band stretched to its limit before snapping.
